title: Can we make Safecracker Evelynn's model a bit bigger ?

replies.body: as long as its not a nerf to her dmg, im cool w/ it :D

A long time ago, it was said that Evelyn wouldn't be getting a new skin until she had a model update. Then she got Safecracker Evelyn skin.

She badly needs a visual update.

I'm really hoping they did that thing to Karma where they completely changed her classic skin and made the original like Traditional Evelynn or something.

Because look at her.
Karma and Sejuani were rather unique cases, and Riot have already said they wont be doing it that way again.

Sadly for Eve there are much more high profile cases in the works such as Poppy, Taric and Urgot that will come first, likely. She will probably get something on the Twitch/Tristana levels when she does.
